articles.title: Centre may invite fresh bids for CEL after charges of rigging
articles.description: The Centre had approved the sale of CEL in November last year to Nandal Leasing and Finance Ltd for ₹210 crore. The transaction was scheduled to be completed by March.

articles.author: Kirtika Suneja
articles.title: India's Q1 growth seen in double digits but inflation, crude prices pose risks
articles.description: Data released June 1 showed goods and services tax (GST) collections topped ₹1.4 lakh crore for the third month running in May, while the manufacturing purchasing managers' index (PMI) remained firmly in the growth zone at 54.6 in that month.
articles.content: India's economy is off to a strong start in the new financial year with several high-frequency indicators holding firm despite multiple headwinds, bouncing back from the tepid fourth quarter of FY22.… [+2686 chars]

articles.author: TNN
articles.title: Metro passengers complain against parking contractors
articles.description: Complaints are pouring in from Metro passengers about harassment by parking contractors at stations. From overcharging to threatening vehicle owners, many Metro users have demanded stringent action against errant contractors.

articles.author: Bella Jaisinghani,Chittaranjan Tembhekar
articles.title: Maharashtra govt seeks to bar home delivery of liquor
articles.description: The state home department has asked the excise commissioner to direct all stakeholders in the liquor industry to stop home delivery of liquor, a service which was encouraged during the lockdown to ensure social distancing.

articles.description: India News: GUWAHATI: The Meghalaya high court has observed that holding the hands of a child and calling them beautiful cannot be considered an act of sexual ass.
